record.title: PERSONAL EXPLANATION
record.narrative:
PERSONAL EXPLANATION -- (House of Representatives - April 14, 2008)

[Page: H2245]

speaking.paragraph: Madam Speaker, I was unavoidably absent from this Chamber today. Had I been present, I would have voted "yea" on rollcall votes 183 and 184, and "nay" on rollcall vote 185.
